IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: Attachments: -Operational Plan -Threat Assessment -Signed vehicle Search and Seizure Warrant -Two Signed phone Search and Seizure Warrants -Signed Maryland State Police Search Warrant Inventory Report and Return (Form 98) for the vehicle. -Maryland State Police Evidence Inventory (Form 98A) for the vehicle. -Two Maryland State Police Request for Laboratory Examination Chain of Custody Log (Form 67). -Statement of Probable Cause -Statement of Charges -Two Discord preservation letters -Chatib chat log -Discord chat log -Updated tracking number -Signed Discord search warrant PROPERTY SEIZED (person): Item 1: One black Samsung Galaxy S8 cellphone, IMEI: 355987081003583 with black phone case. PROPERTY SEIZED (vehicle): Item 1: One black BLU Products, Model: S91 phone with black case. PROPERTY OWNER/ACCUSED: Borunda, Luis Esteban (W/M, DOB: 8/27/1958) Narrative: On August 22, 2023, United States Army Special Agent Kyle Hannum (hereby referred to as UCA) was conducting undercover investigations to identify suspects involved in the on-line sexual exploitation of children. On this date, UCA operates as a 13-year-old girl, Chloe on a social networking application called Chatib.us when he was solicited for sexual acts by an unknown individual identified as Steve. Initial contact with Steve was established using Chatib app at approximately 1512 hours. Steve initiated contact with Chloe on the Chatib app and immediately asked do u msg older men? Steve then said, how young are u? I like very young girls so please dont hate me. Chloe responded, im 13 lol. I dont hate you. Steve replied, I love 13, I met 15 yo girls b4 but never 13, do u think you would want to meet? Steve also said that he was 49 and added, it would be hot and naughty to meet her. Steve wanted to meet up and asked if Chloe had Snap which Chloe said she did not, Steve asked, how can we plan? Chloe asked what about discord? Steve provided Chloe with his discord username guyinmd. Steve sent Chloe messages via Discord to continue chatting. While messaging through Discord, Steve stated, I like that u seem mature for ur age. Chloe answered Thanks that makes me feel good! and Steve stated, Wait until you feel how good my tongue feels in ur pussy hehe Im sorry Im so bad. Steve told Chloe I want u to get wet when I talk to u. Its ok and normal, It shows me that u like me, I want ur pussy to want me too. During the conversation, Steve advised he generally works in DC as a consultant who works with people from other countries that want to do business in the US. Chloe asked Steve Oh wow that sounds cool! Do you wear a suit? Steve stated Lol yes, But when we meet I wont be wearing one lol. On August 23, 2023, Steve advised he wanted to meet Chloe and mentioned the possibility of meeting at a park near the CVS in Severn, MD. Steve sent Chloe a filtered black and white picture of himself. During the conversation, they agreed to meet on Wednesday, August 30, 2023 at 10am. Steve then asked Chloe if she drank coffee. Chloe replied, I only drink the really girly ones haha. I like the mocha frappes from Starbucks the best! Steve offered a brownie as well. Steve asked Chloe what outfit she might be wearing the day that they meet up and she sent him a picture of a multicolored shirt and jeans. On August 27, 2023, Steve asked Chloe, Hey, we should game plan a little bit ok? What time should I pick u up? I looked at the area a little bit an I have some suggestions. Chloe stated, Hmmm, I think 10 is okay. Ill be awake and be able to walk to the park by then. Steve asked for the name of the park and Chloe stated, Province park is the one your talking about right? Steve confirmed that was the park and they talked about the baseball field to meet up and have a back-up plan. Steve also said to Chloe what he wanted to do the day they met up. Chloe, just so that we understand each other ... Im looking at Wednesday as a get to know each other day.. maybe kissing and getting to know what you like sexually... I am not going into this to fuck... At least not on Wednesday haha... So I dont want u to feel pressure... Just know that ur going to feel very good... On August 29, 2023, Steve told Chloe if there were a lot of cars in the parking lot to meet at the orange jungle gym. Steve also said he might Uber to the park or he has a black Chevy Sedan. On August 30, 2023, at approximately 0930 hours, undercover Special Agents with the Army-CID, Naval Criminal Investigations Services (NCIS) and the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Unit (MSP CCU) were posted inside and in the area of the Province Park awaiting Steves arrival to meet with Chloe who would be an undercover NCIS Special Agent. While conducting surveillance, of the CVS parking lot, Sgt Cooper (MSP) noticed a black Chevy Impala with MD registration 3ET3854, sitting in the parking lot directly next to his vehicle. The subject in the vehicle had dark hair and glasses, there was also a suit hanging up in the back seat. Sgt Cooper maintained surveillance on the subject who appeared to be texting on his phone. At this time, Steve was still communicating with Chloe. Sgt. Cooper watched the individual exit his vehicle carrying a green object and began to walk on foot towards the park with a green object in his left hand and a bottle of liquid in his right hand. At this time, Steve told Chloe that he was close and asked her to walk towards the orange jungle gym. When this message was sent, the unidentified subject was still on foot in the area of the park. The undercover female officer then walked towards the orange jungle gym. Sgt. Cooper then watched as the subject returned shortly thereafter and got back into the black Impala. The subject then proceeded to drive past the park several times before turning in, which was observed by other undercover officers. At the same time, Steve asked Chloe if she was okay since there were police near the park. Sgt Cooper noted that Fort Meade officers had stopped a vehicle just up from the park on Disney Road. Surveillance officers watched the black Impala pull into the parks parking lot before pulling back out. The black Impala drove by no less than 4 times. Steve then told Chloe that he was leaving because he was getting nervous with all of the police around. He told Chloe to go home and text him when she was safe. Chloe started walking home towards the CVS and observed the black Impala slow down and drive pass her. The black Impala turned around in the CVS parking lot and circled passed Chloe again who was walking on the sidewalk along Disney Road. At this time, TFC Burnett was following Chloe and observed the black Impala slow up beside Chloe and then pulled back in to the CVS parking lot. Chloe then crossed the street and the black Impala pulled into a parking spot. Investigators then made the decision to stop and arrest the driver. Investigators converged on the black Impala as it was attempting to leave. The driver was placed under arrest for Sexual Solicitation of a Minor without incident. The driver was identified by his Maryland drivers license as Luis Esteban Borunda, 8/27/1958, with an Essex, Maryland address. A black Samsung Galaxy S8 cellphone, IMEI: 355987081003583 with black phone case was recovered from Borundas right pants pocket. Borunda was transported to the Maryland State Police Glen Burnie Barrack for further processing. Borunda was held in the Barracks prisoner cell. Borunda denied talking to any investigators. The Chevrolet Impala was seized from the CVS parking lot and towed to the Maryland State Police Glen Burnie Barrack for a search warrant to be authored. TFC Burnett authored a search warrant for the black Chevrolet Impala bearing Maryland registration 3ET3854, and a search warrant for the black Samsung Galaxy S8 cellphone, IMEI: 355987081003583 with black phone case. These were signed by the Honorable Judge Asti with the Anne Arundel County Circuit Court. At approximately 1515 hours, investigators searched the Impala and recovered a black BLU Products cellphone, Model: S91 Pro from underneath the drivers seat. May it be noted that Discord was the main source of communication between Steve and Chloe. Investigators observed numerous Discord notifications on the front screen of the phone. Previously, SA Hannum sent a message to the Discord user guyinmd (Steve) which coordinated with the notifications on the phone. Also, investigators located condoms hidden in the center console underneath of the bottoms cover. There was also a lime green microfiber rag and water bottle sitting on the front passenger seat. A lime green insulated bottle with coffee sitting in the center cup holder. In the trunk there was a black bag with miscellaneous sex toys, cleansing wipes, lubricant and a paper towel. There were also opened, and unopened bottles of alcohol in the trunk. Borunda signed the Maryland State Police Search Warrant Inventory Report and Return (Form 98) and the vehicle was released back to Borunda. Cpl. Heid and TFC Burnett transported Borunda to the Anne Arundel Detention Center, where he was placed into the jails custody with all of his appropriate paperwork. At this time, a new updated tracking number was issued for Borundas charges by the jail. Sgt. Cooper took possession of both of the phones and transported them to the Maryland State Police Forensics Lab and delivered to DFE Casey for further examination. On August 31, 2023, TFC Burnett authored a search warrant for the black BLU Products cellphone, Model: S91 Pro, which was signed by the Honorable Judge Asti with the Anne Arundel County Circuit Court. TFC Burnett also sent Judge Asti the Maryland State Police Search Warrant Inventory Report and Return (Form 98) for the vehicle and the Maryland State Police Evidence Inventory (Form 98A) for the vehicle to be signed. On September 1, 2023, S/A Hannum resubmitted an updated preservation letter for the creation to current date of the Discord account guyinmd#1658 to Discord. On September 5, 2023, TFC Burnett authored a search warrant for the Discord account guyinmd#1658 which was signed by the Honorable Judge Celeste with the Anne Arundel Circuit Court. The signed search warrant was submitted to Discord through the portal with the reference #DISC-3876. The Computer Crimes Unit received a phone call from an Erick Oribio who advised he saw the news and had very important information for the case. Oribio explained that he has worked with Borunda for years and would like to tell someone what he knows. Oribio requested a Spanish-speaking Officer to assist him in the interview, which will be scheduled at a later date. Also, I received an email from Detective Swope with the Washington County Sheriffs Office, advising that their agency possibly conducted an undercover operation between August 21-25, 2023 with Borunda. I contacted Det. Swope by phone and she advised her agency observed the altered photograph of Borunda that he sent to Chloe and recognized it from their undercover chatting operation with Borunda. Det. Swope provided their undercover agents Snapchat username Matty Malone and Jackie Remy. Case closed by adult arrest, but pending further investigation.

Attachments: -Signed residential search warrant -Two Chain of Custody (Form 67) -Property Record: P- 344638 and continuation sheet -Images of Wendy Campbell -Images of Borundas wedding ring Narrative: On 9/6/2023, DFE Casey explained while looking through Borundas BLU Products phone he observed numerous chats, specifically to a girl listed as Wendy Campbell, 15 Victorville through text message and Snapchat. DFE Casey advised the contacts (both Snapchat and phone/native), timeline, chatconversations(native between both numbers), network usage (Comfort Suites router/SSID), and the one video with a modified date of: 8/13/2023: of an unknown, young nude female. The video appears to be in a hotel setting, and digital penetration is observed as well as cunnilingus. Luis Borunda is clearly identified in the video. The female appears to be high school age (ikely somewhere between 14-16. Developed body but a young face). I observed the video of interest, which is described below: Filename: 5194118473894742607 File path:EXTRACTION_FFS.zip/data/data/com.google.android.apps.messaging/cache/mediascratchspace/5194118473894742607 Description:The video is 06:09 in length. The video is of a young nude female (age unknown). She is in a bed and is observed utilizing a smartphone. A males hand is observed digitally penetrating the females vagina with his fingers. The males hand is wearing what appears to be a wedding ring on his index finger. At approximately 02:38 into the video, a male appears to be Luis Borunda (based upon his Maryland drivers license photograph, and other smartphone pictures) is observed performing cunnilingus on the female. The bed sheets and comforter are white and appear to be consistent with a hotel setting. The phone number for Wendy Campbell is (760-265-8736), which returns to the area of Victorville, CA. Through an open-source database, the phone number is registered through Metro PCS and returns to Latesh Campbell. On 9/7/2023, DFE Casey provided the below flight information that was located in Borundas calendar of his Galaxy S8 phone, it did not provide carrier. -7/18/2023 flight #0495, confirmation#31VEWB -8/15/23 flight #1180 -The phone was used to connect to the Southwest Airlines WiFi on both 7/18/2023 and 8/15/2023 On 9/8/2023, Cpl. Heid contacted me by phone advising that D/Sgt. Zeller received a phone call from a family member who wished to stay anonymous, advising that they observed child pornography on Borundas laptop. Cpl. Heid explained that a couple investigators were going to the residence with a search warrant to seize the devices (see Cpl. Heids supplement for further details). On 9/11/2023, S/A Hannum was assisting in trying to identify the Wendy Campbell subject with facial recognition. She is identified as Wendy Aisha Campbell (DOB: 10/9/2007) (15 yoa), mothers address:16555 San Juan Pl, Victorville, CA 92395. Below is additional information: -It appears Wendy lives with her Mother Latesha Franklin in California, but she has also recently lived in AZ with her guardian (Grandfather) Lee Franklin. -Wendy was the victim of another online solicitation in Arizona in April 2023 (See attached D-Dex 2023 Incident) I reached out to the Arizona Police department that handled the investigation to obtain additional information. I am currently awaiting a call back. -It appears Wendy Campbell andBorundahave probably met before. He mentioned in one of the messages that he wanted to do the same thing as last time. And he referred to being at the apartment where he dropped her previously. Within the report from the Maricopa County Sheriffs Office in Arizona, on 4/20/2023, Wendy Campbell was caught during school chatting to an adult male online. She advised she met him through Chatib.com and started chatting further through a Word document that they could both edit. Wendy advised that she did send them a couple inappropriate pictures of herself, and they also sent her a picture of his penis. Wendys guardians (Lee Franklin and Shirley Jacobs) came to pick Wendy up from school. On 4/28/2023, contact with Shirley revealed Wendy went back to her mother, Leticia Campbell (Shirleys niece) on 4/22/2023 in Victorville, CA. Wendy attends the Silverado High School. It was made known by Shirley that Leticia is deaf and would not communicate very well. Shirley advised Lee Franklin is Leticias father and he has parental rights to Wendy. -Lee Franklin- 623-522-2431 -Shirley Jacobs- 623-688-9737 -Address: 3622 N 292ND Dr, Buckeye, AZ 85369 DFE Casey provided me a Griffeye Analysis Report with numerous items that he observed within the phone, listed below: -pictures of the female (Wendy Campbell) -pictures of Luis Borunda -altered pictures of Luis Borunda -pictures of female children underwear by themselves -pictures of the female children underwear with Borundas face or penis in it At approximately 1630 hours, Cpl. Heid assisted the Baltimore Child Advocacy Center with a forensic interview of Borundas 10 year old adopted daughter, Macie Borunda (see Cpl. Heids supplement for further details). It was advised that there were no disclosures of any abuse from Luis Borunda. While at the interview, Sharon Borunda, Luis Borundas wife advised she was cleaning the house and recovered a few electronic devices which she turned over for a forensic examination. Cpl. Heid placed the devices on a Chain of Custody (Form 67) and placed them into the temporary locker at the MSP Golden Ring Barrack. On 9/12/2023, at approximately 1000 hours, I observed the devices in the Computer Crimes Unit temporary storage and placed them on a continued property record sheet (P-344638), pending a search warrant. Case open, investigation ongoing.

ATTACHMENTS: - One image of suspect on foot walking towards park NARRATIVE: On 8/30/2023, I was requested to assist the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Unit with surveillance related to an investigation into sexual solicitation of a minor. I was briefed on the facts of the case and informed that the suspect had agreed to meet with what he believed to be a 13-year-old female in the Provinces Park in Anne Arundel County. The park is located at 1742 Disney Road, Severn, MD. The suspect had indicted that he was aware of the undercover profiles age of 13, and he voiced his intent to engage in sexual acts with her. I was provided with a selfie picture that the suspect had sent to the undercover account and that the suspect had stated that he would likely be driving a black Chevrolet sedan to the park and that he had offered to bring a Starbucks coffee. A review of the picture sent by the suspect indicated that the picture had several filters applied to it to make the subject look younger and have facial hair. In looking at the edges of the face I could see gray salt and pepper style hair on the side of the subjects head and the skin on the subjects neck looked darker and more wrinkled than the rest of the face where the filters were applied. Additionally, I noted that the subject in the picture had black framed glasses. At approximately 0845 hours, I responded to the area of the park in my unmarked car CE-79. I checked the area for black Chevrolet sedans with no results prior to setting up a surveillance position at the CVS Pharmacy located at 2600 Annapolis Road, Severn, MD. The CVS was located at the corner of MD-175 and Disney Road in the travel path between the Provinces Park and the nearest Starbucks. The CVS is approximately .3 miles from the Provinces Park entrance. I parked in the CVS parking lot along the side of the building facing Disney Road at approximately 0850 hours and began to watch the parking lot and Disney Road to keep and eye out for anyone matching the suspect description or vehicle description. Shortly before 0930 hours, I observed a black newer model Chevrolet Impala approach the CVS on Disney Road from MD-175 and pull into the CVS lot on the side facing MD-175. I did not see anyone get out of the vehicle on foot and the vehicle remained on the lot for several minutes. The vehicle then proceeded to move positions to the side parking lot facing Disney Road and park two spaces away from my vehicle. I could see that a suit with a white shirt was hanging in the back window behind the drivers seat. I observed a Hispanic male that appeared to be in his 60s in the drivers seat. He appeared to be alone in the vehicle. The subject sat parked in the vehicle for an extended period of time and appeared to be looking down in his lap as if he was typing on or using a mobile device. I noted that he had gray and black salt and pepper hair and was wearing black framed glasses that were very similar to the glasses in the picture sent to the undercover account by the suspect. At one point the subject got out of the vehicle and accessed the trunk of the impala. I observed a green aluminum bottle in the cup holder and that he was wearing a black t-shirt and khaki colored pants. He again entered the drivers seat without entering the CVS and appeared to using a phone looking down at his lap. At one point he placed sunglasses on while seated in the vehicle. At approximately 1006 hours Agent Hannum advised that he had just told the suspect that he (the undercover profile) had arrived in the park. Almost simultaneously, I heard the subject start the Impala and then he pulled out of the parking spot. The car slowly circled the CVS lot and then pulled out of the lot onto eastbound MD-175. At approximately 1016 hours, I was still in the same stationary position when I observed the driver of the Impala walking from the front side of the CVS parking lot on foot towards my location. He was carrying a clear plastic water bottle in his right hand and what appeared to be a cylindrical object in a green bag in his left hand. I observed him walk through the parking lot behind my vehicle and then out of the lot onto Disney Road headed in the direction of the park. Several minutes passed, and I heard a police siren going off. I then observed a Fort Meade Military Police Officer initiate a traffic stop at the intersection of MD-175 and Disney Road. At approximately 1022 hours, I was notified that the suspect had informed the under cover account that he was at the park. This was consistent with the amount of time it would have taken for the subject I saw on foot to have walked to the park. I then proceeded to leave my stationary position to get closer to the park. As I drove down Disney Road towards the park I observed the driver of the Impala that had walked past me earlier walking back towards the CVS. As I drove past him, he looked hard at my patrol vehicle. In order to not continue being seen by the subject, I proceeded down Disney Road and parked a distance away in a neighborhood. Other members of the surveillance team remained in the CVS parking lot and other positions with vantage points on the park. For approximately the next 30-40 minutes the surveillance team observed the driver of the Impala, later identified as Luis Borunda, circle the park multiple times as well as having pulled into the park several times. At approximately 1100 hours, Borunda was followed back to the CVS parking lot where he was stopped in his vehicle and taken into custody. A black Samsung smartphone was seized from his person at the time of his arrest pending a search warrant being obtained to search the phone. Borundas Impala was seized and secured pending a search warrant being executed on the vehicle. I remained with the vehicle and the Glen Burnie barrack was contacted and sent a tow for the vehicle to be taken back to the barrack. TTS towing responded and towed the vehicle from the CVS to the barrack. I remained with the vehicle and followed it back to the barrack. TFC. Burnett authored and obtained a search warrant for the vehicle on 8/30/2023. At approximately 1515 hours, TFC. Burnett, Agent Hannum and I executed the search warrant on Borundas Impala. While searching the vehicle, I located a black Blu Products smartphone in a black case under the drivers seat of the vehicle. The phone was retrieved from under the seat and when the phone was picked up the screen illuminated indicating that it was powered on. I noted that on the screen were multiple Discord notifications. It should be noted that Agent Hannum was utilizing Discord to communicate with the suspect throughout the day. Also located in the vehicle were condoms, personal lubricant and vibrating penis rings. See TFC. Burnetts report for further details regarding the search of the vehicle. After the search of the Impala was completed, I took possession of both of Borundas cell phones and transported them to the Maryland State Police Digital Forensics lab for processing pending search warrants being obtained. This concluded my involvement in the investigation on 8/30/2023. ALL OF THE ABOVE EVENTS DID OCCUR IN ANNE ARUNDEL COUNTY, MARYLAND

ACTION TAKEN: On Friday September 8, 2023, D/Sgt B. Zeller was contacted by a family member of Sharon Borunda. The family member, who asked to remain anonymous, advised D/Sgt Zeller that they were requested by Sharon Borunda, to try and remove her husbands Facebook page as it contained photos of her grandchildren. Apparently since her husbands arrest, several members of the public have been taking screen shots of some of his photos that include her grandchildren. The family member went on to say that they logged on to Luis Borundas laptop computer which was already on in Sharons bedroom. While attempting to access his Facebook page, they discovered an image of a female child that was nude. The child was clearly underage and was exposing her vagina. The family member immediately stopped and called D/Sgt Zeller and asked him to come remove the laptop. D/Sgt Zeller contacted Cpl. C. Heid and asked for assistance. Cpl. Heid called Sharon Borunda and asked her about the details of the potential child pornography. Sharon reiterated what the family member had told D/Sgt Zeller. Sharon stated that she would give MSP consent to come and remove the property. Sharon stated that there was also a cell phone and thumb drives as well. Sharon told Cpl. Heid that these items are Luis and she does not use them. A decision was made at that time to prepare a residential search warrant. Cpl. Heid informed Sharon Borunda that a search warrant was applied for and that troopers would be coming by to contact her. Sgt M. Pitcher authored the residential search warrant which was later signed by the Honorable Judge Kevin Wiggins of the District Court of Maryland for Baltimore County. On September 8, 2023, at approximately 2358 hours, the search warrant was executed at Sharon Borundas home at 903 Lance Avenue, Essex, MD, 21221. Ms. Borunda led investigators to her bedroom where she stated Luis kept all of his electronic devices. Ms. Borunda stated that Luis pass code is usually 2620. Investigators seized an HP laptop, a Western Digital hard drive, a Samsung cell phone, and four flash drives. Ms. Borunda was provided with a search warrant inventory return as well as a copy of the search warrant. The seized items were packaged per MSP policy and transported to MSP CED Headquarters. On September 11, 2023, Cpl. Heid met with Sharon Borunda, and her daughter, Macie Borunda at the Baltimore County Child Advocacy Center, for a scheduled forensic interview. Prior to meeting, Sharon Borunda contacted Cpl. Heid and advised that she had some additional electronic devices of Luis that she wanted to turn over. The forensic interview was conducted by Ms. Micehlle Delovich. During the interview, Macie made no disclosures about any potential abuse from Luis Borunda. After the interview, Cpl. Heid spoke briefly with Sharon Borunda. Cpl. Heid showed Sharon photos of girls underwear that were located on one of Luis devices. Sharon stated that the pink underwear with orange piping and the blue underwear with white piping appeared to belong to Macie. Ms. Borunda was going to check Macies clothing at a later time. Sharon Borunda turned over an HP laptop, a black Seagate hard drive, a white Seagate hard drive, and two SECU ATM cards in Luis name. She stated that she located these items while cleaning out her home for a potential sale. Cpl. Heid packaged the items per MSP policy and transported them to MSP Golden Ring Barrack where they were placed in the property room. On September 12, 2023, Cpl. Heid retrieved the items from MSP Golden Ring and transported the property to CED Headquarters. The items were then placed into the temporary storage locker for TFC Burnett. CASE TO REMAIN OPEN

ATTACHMENTS: -Two Maryland State Police Chain of Custody (Form 67) for the additional devices -Signed search warrant for the additional devices -Lab IR -Forensic lab request for service -Subpoena for Choice Hotels International -Google preservation letter -KIK preservation letter -Snapchat preservation letter -Signed Google search warrant -Signed KIK search warrant -Signed Snapchat search warrant -Kik subscriber information -Kik chat and other information -Maryland State Police Search Warrant Report and Return (Form 98) for the Kik search warrant -Maryland State Police Evidence Inventory (Form 98A) for the Kik search warrant -Discord subscriber information -Discord message transactional records -Discord business records certification -Forensic lab report from DFE Casey NARRATIVE: On 9/11/2023, at approximately 1043 hours, TFC Burnett retrieved the items from the Forensic labs evidence room, that were seized from the residence (903 Lance Ave, Essex, MD) on 9/8/2023. The items that were seized from the residence are listed below and are documented on a chain of custody (Form 67) and property record, P-344638. PROPERTY SEIZED (residence): Item 1: One blue Samsung Galaxy S10e cellphone with a USB connector Item 2: One Western Digital external hard drive, S/N: WX71A63T4361 Item 3: One black HP laptop, S/N: CND12545G3 with power cord Item 4: One black PNY 16 gb flash drive Item 5: One black NXT 32 gb flash drive Item 6: One Tknika flash drive Item 7: One blue Google flash drive The items were placed back into the Forensic labs evidence room at approximately 1245 hours to be assigned an examiner. Prior to a scheduled forensic interview with Sharon Borunda and her daughter, Macie Borunda at the Baltimore County Child Advocacy Center, Cpl. Heid was contacted by Sharon regarding more of Luis Borundas devices she found within the residence. During the interview, Cpl. Heid retrieved the devices from Sharon and documented on a chain of custody (Form 67). Cpl. Heid transported the devices to the MSP Golden Ring Barrack and placed them in the temporary storage. On 9/12/2023, the devices were retrieved by Cpl. Heid and transported to the Computer Crimes Units temporary storage. On 9/12/2023, at approximately 1000 hours, I retrieved the devices from the temporary storage, which are documented below: ADDITIONAL PROPERTY SEIZED (residence): Item 1: One black HP laptop, S/N: CND6126F8W with power cord Item 2: One black Seagate hard drive, S/N: 9QF35YKG with power cord Item 3: One white Seagate hard drive, S/N: 2GEXZL75 with power cord Item 4: Two SECU bank ATM cards under the name Luis E Borunda, (5834196002928528) (5834196002928494) These items were placed back into the temporary storage unit at approximately 1130 hours, pending a search warrant. On 9/18/2023, during the forensic extraction, it was identified that Borunda had the below accounts that were of question. Preservation letters were sent to Google, KIK, and Snapchat to preserve the accounts. Google Preservation # 42907078 Google Email Address: position:relative; top:0.5pt; text-decoration:underline; vertical-align:baseline">Luiseborunda@gmail.com Google Email Address: position:relative; top:0.5pt; text-decoration:underline; vertical-align:baseline">guyinmd01@gmail.com KIK Preservation # (KIK-15968) KIK Username: mdOlderguy4u Snapchat Preservation # 6279d51c7e Phone: +16673217638 Email Address: jugrajs72123@outlook.com Screen/User Name: juggyys#0 ESP User ID: 1120806792943910966 On 9/19/2023, S/A Hannum authored subpoena for the Comfort Suites in Victorville-Hesperia area to retrieve and documents, camera footage from Borundas stay around the time that Wendy Campbell was seen in the video file on Borundas phone. On 9/22/2023, the Honorable Judge Brooks with the Howard County District Court signed the search warrant for the additional devices that were provided by Sharon Borunda. A Forensic laboratory request for service was completed and provided to DFE Casey to continue with the examination. I also authored a search warrant for the Google, Snapchat and Kik accounts, which were signed by the Honorable Judge Porter with the Howard County District Court, each one was submitted with the below reference numbers. Google # 43359912 KIK- # KIK-16126 Snapchat- # 51c56c9fbd On 9/26/2023, I received the KIK search warrant return with the subscriber information, and other such as chat platform sent received, bind, chat platform sent, chat sent received, chat sent which are attached to the report: SUBSCRIBER INFORMATION: Name: Steve Zellet Email: position:relative; top:0.5pt; text-decoration:underline; vertical-align:baseline">guyinmd01@gmail.com Username: mdolderguy4u 2023/03/24 01:30:28 UTC REGISTRATION_TIMESTAMP 2023/03/23 20:30:28 REGISTRATION_CLIENT_INFO android-id=8e24ed467eb87083 REGISTRATION_CLIENT_INFO brand=BLU REGISTRATION_CLIENT_INFO model=S91 Pro 2023/08/16 20:31:59 UTC USER_LOCATION ES (tz: Unknown, ip: 185.223.152.177) The Honorable Judge Porter signed the Maryland State Police Search Warrant Report and Return (Form 98) for the Kik search warrant and the Maryland State Police Evidence Inventory (Form 98A) for the Kik search warrant. On 11/7/2023, SA DiAntonio (HSI), SA Hannum (Army CID), and I, TFC Burnett traveled to Victorville, California to interview Wendy Campbell and photograph the hotel room where the video of Wendy Campbell and Luis Borunda was recorded. SA DiAntonio made contact with Wendys parents and requested an interview of Wendy on 11/8/2023. On 11/8/2023, SA DiAntonio, SA Hannum and TFC Burnett visited the Comfort Suites Inn in Victorville, CA and met with the manager. Pursuant to an HSI summons, the Comfort Inn provided video footage from Borundas two visits to their hotel on July 27, 2023, and August 12, 2023. The manager also allowed us to access Room # 329, where Borunda stayed during the creation of the production video. We took several photographs of the room, and it was observed to be identical to the production video. At approximately 1530 hours, we made contact with the forensic interviewer, Brenda, victims assistant, and the ALS translator (for the parents) at the Victorville Sheriffs Office to go over the case details. At approximately 1630 hours, we made contact with Wendy, her sister, and her mother, Lateisha Campbell and step-father, Greg Campbell. After introductions, Brenda took Wendy into the interview room, which was audibly and visually recorded and started the interview at approximately 1703 hours.
